Text: Serial don't work

The first time it rejects block it with your firewall and then hit ok again. Other wise Mod your Host file.

# localhost name resolution is handled within DNS itself.
#	0.0.0.0 sams.nikonimaging.com
#	0.0.0.0 sams.nikonimaging.com

oOpS I copy and pasted the wrong info.

Just add either

0.0.0.0 sams.nikonimaging.com

or

127.0.0.1	sams.nikonimaging.com

to your host file

c:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc\hosts
I can also assuming you can probably disco from the internet and do the same provided the program doesn't call home periodically.

** WARNING cnx2.exe Contains the Trojan ADH **

Works like a charm on Win 7 64 bit. Note: there is a lot of BS here about viruses or unable to install etc. It is just the companies trying to stop people from downloading. Just download, edit your host file (run Notepad as Administrator to edit it) and then fill in the user and key provided. Works 100% - good luck guys and girls!

I have previously used the free trial which has expired. I uninstalled it and installed this. I made the changes to the hosts file. I am running Vista 32 bit. Using the given serial I receive a Nikon Software License - Warning "The following product key is valid". No sign of an virus detection. Could it be that the people who got this to work were only in fact getting the free trial to work?

Maybe this will help.

Make sure before installing:

- Edit the file with notepad [hosts] - C: / windows/system32/drivers/etc/hosts
- Add the line: 127.0.0.1 sams.nikonimaging.com
- Now the program will not connect to the server and will not block key.

It works great...Make sure you unplug your computer from internet while installing program and serial number...Then go and up-date host file as explained in the previous comment...Add the line: 127.0.0.1 sams.nikonimaging.com
Once you do all of this you can connect computer to the internet and run program.
ginnyone your help was great help to me thanks

what i did? i downloaded the torrent, Norton detected virus in .exe file, then i downloaded trial version from nikon's website and applied the serial key, i noticed the Key only works with internet connection off, so i blocked NX2 with my Norton's firewall, now the software cannot connect to internet and so its working fine for me,
